document.full_text: u.s. stocks dropped on tuesday on worries falling oil prices could set off a reversal in the high-flying energy sector, while alcoa's leaner-than-expected revenue disappointed.
document.title: energy drives wall st lower, alcoa's results drag
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks dropped on tuesday on worries falling oil prices could set off a reversal in the high-flying energy sector, while alcoa's leaner-than-expected revenue disappointed.
